message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand your concern about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
I'm getting close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
I'm really close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $129.
I'm really close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $127?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll meet you at $128, but that's my final offer.
